name: My name is Hadi Modi, and this is my journey from a young gamer to a passionate developer and entrepreneur. Let me take you through my story.The Early Days: A Gamer at HeartLike many kids my age, I started my journey with a deep love for gaming. Spending hours immersed in exciting worlds, challenging myself to beat levels, and bonding with friends over virtual adventures, gaming was more than just a hobby for me—it was a passion. However, over time, I noticed something wasn’t quite right. Long gaming sessions started to give me headaches, making me realize I needed a change in my routine.A New Chapter: Inspiration from My MotherIt was during this time of reflection that my mother stepped in and introduced me to a new path—one that would combine my love for technology with creativity and innovation. Her encouragement inspired me to explore the world of web development, Roblox game development, and domain work. What started as a small step turned into a journey of discovery and growth.Diving into the Digital WorldRoblox Development: Roblox became my creative playground. I started designing and developing my own obby games, bringing unique ideas to life and sharing them with the community. Seeing players enjoy my creations gave me a sense of fulfillment and motivated me to keep learning.Web Development: As I ventured further, I discovered the fascinating world of web development. Building websites and applications opened up endless possibilities for creativity and problem-solving. I honed my skills, turning ideas into functional and visually appealing platforms.Domain Work: Alongside these pursuits, I also explored domain work—an exciting field that involves buying, selling, and managing domain names. It’s a blend of strategy, business acumen, and market research, and it’s become another area where I continue to grow.What I’ve LearnedThrough this journey, I’ve learned that challenges often lead to growth. My headaches were a wake-up call, pushing me toward something bigger. With my mother’s guidance and my determination to learn, I’ve turned my interests into meaningful work.Looking AheadToday, I’m proud to call myself a Roblox developer, a web developer, and a domain expert. The road ahead is full of possibilities, and I’m excited to keep exploring, learning, and creating.To all young creators out there: don’t be afraid to try something new. Sometimes, the best opportunities come from unexpected places. Keep pushing, keep growing, and you’ll find your path—just like I did.
